name: WhiteGold Fund Management
overview:
Rayfort - WhiteGold Fund Management is a multi-strategy London-based family office. We aim to provide bespoke opportunities to our investors, using our extensive proprietary deal flow to achieve strong returns.

One of our key investment focuses is private equity, and we provide capital to companies at various phases of development, from early to growth stage.

Through our extensive network, we actively seek out exceptional companies with outstanding management teams. We invest where we see the opportunity for rapid and robust scalability. Our capital enables entrepreneurs to build valuable businesses and we offer a quick but considered investment process.

WhiteGold was launched in London in September 2009. Our sister company is Moscow-based SiTek-Invest, which provides asset management services in Russia. Through our dual presence in London and Moscow, we bridge East and West, enabling us to take advantage of the best of both markets.
